author: adityapatwardhan
body:
The hot spots are identified on two metrics: likelihood of usage and number or missing lines. Adding coverage for these gaps should increase the code coverage significantly.

comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT  @JamesWTruher  Please have look. I have addressed feedback.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:

@TravisEz13 This is ready to merge.

title: Added code coverage analysis to identify missing coverage
